import { useContext } from "react"; import { FiSearch } from "react-icons/fi"; import EdTechSingle from "./EdTechSingle"; import { EdTechsContext } from "../../context/EdTechsContext"; import EdTechsFilter from "./EdTechsFilter"; const EdTechsGrid = () => { const { EdTechs, searchEdTech, setSearchEdTech, searchEdTechsByTitle, selectEdTech, setSelectEdTech, selectEdTechsByCategory, } = useContext(EdTechsContext); return (
